text: @MikeBloomberg Tell 'em Bloomberg. We need to push this wear a mask to start school in FALL 2020. SN: We're still a little salty at ya but we understand why you got in the race and when you did. Hit some of us harder than we wanted, but we understand. also @CNNTonight @JoeBiden #COVID19 #MaskUp
